GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object with the requested username

GET /api/users/:username/habits.description: serves an array of habits for the requested username

POST /api/users.description: adds a user to the data base and responds with the added user

PATCH /api/users/:username.description: updates requested user object's email and or password

DELETE /api/users/:username.description: removes the user with the selected username

GET /api/habits.description: serves an array of all habits

GET /api/habits/:habit_id.description: serves a habit object for the requested habit_id

POST /api/habits.description: adds a habit to the database and responds with the added habit

DELETE /api/habits/:habit_id.description: removes the habit with the selected id

GET /api/habit-logs.description: serves an array of all habit logs

GET /api/habit-logs/:habit_id.description: serves an array of habit logs for a given habit

POST /api/habit-logs/:habit_id.description: adds a log to the database and responds with the added log
